member.name: T:CButtonLib.My.Resources.Resources
member.summary: A strongly-typed resource class, for looking up localized strings, etc.

member.name: P:CButtonLib.My.Resources.Resources.ResourceManager
member.summary: Returns the cached ResourceManager instance used by this class.

member.name: P:CButtonLib.My.Resources.Resources.Culture
member.summary: Overrides the current thread's CurrentUICulture property for all resource lookups using this strongly typed resource class.

member.name: T:CButtonLib.CButton
member.summary: Custom Button Control with Gradient Colors and Extra Image (VB.NET)

member.name: P:CButtonLib.CButton.Shape
member.summary: The Shape of the Button as eShape choices (Ellipse, Rectangle, and Triangles)

member.name: P:CButtonLib.CButton.DimFactorHover
member.summary: Get or Set how much to dim the color on mouse rollover. Positive to Lighten and negative to Darken

member.name: P:CButtonLib.CButton.DimFactorClick
member.summary: Get or Set how much to dim the color on mouse down. Positive to Lighten and negative to Darken

member.summary: Get or Set the Border color

member.summary: Get or Set whether to show the Border

member.name: P:CButtonLib.CButton.ShowFocus
member.summary: Get or Set the Focus queue

member.name: P:CButtonLib.CButton.FillType
member.summary: The eFillType Fill Type to apply to the CButton

member.name: P:CButtonLib.CButton.FillTypeLinear
member.summary: The Linear Blend type

member.name: P:CButtonLib.CButton.ColorFillSolid
member.summary: The Solid Color to fill the CButton

member.name: P:CButtonLib.CButton.ColorFillBlend
member.summary: The ColorBlend used to fill the CButton

member.summary: Get or Set the Button Text

member.summary: Get or Set the alignment for the text

member.summary: Get or Set the margion between the text and the button edge

member.name: P:CButtonLib.CButton.TextImageRelation
member.summary: Get or Set the Relationship of the Text to the Image

member.summary: Get or Set if the Text has a shadow

member.summary: Get or Set the color of the Shadow Text

member.summary: Get or Set the small Image next to text

member.summary: Get or Set the placement of the Image

member.summary: Get or Set the Size of the Image

member.summary: Get or Set the ImageList control

member.summary: Get or Set the ImageList control

member.summary: Get or Set the Side Image Alignment

member.name: P:CButtonLib.CButton.FocalPoints
member.summary: The CenterPoint and FocusScales for the ColorBlend

member.name: P:CButtonLib.CButton.UseMnemonic
member.summary: If true, the first character proceeded by an ampersand will be used as the button's mnemonic key.

member.name: M:CButtonLib.CButton.DimTheColor(System.Drawing.Color,System.Int32)
member.summary: This function takes the given color and Lightens or Darkens it by the given value
member.param: Base Color object to be changed
Positive value to darken and negative value to lighten DimColor

member.name: M:CButtonLib.CButton.GrayTheColor(System.Drawing.Color)
member.summary: This function takes the given color and returns its gray equivilant
